author: Jonatan
text: my order hasn't shipped in 4 days bro like dang what is doing at stock its all good, I would like my shoes but why does it take so long I wish they added a feature where u could pay more tho get faster delivery, my first shoe too man I thought my first buy would be swift n clean man a whole week and the seller hadn't shipped yet got me matched used with some else, stocks said they would email me but don't get emails act my shoes but instead they advertise o buy the shoes on there and its annoying could be better I thought it was better we'll see next time if there is a next time and that processing fee gotta go paying a lot of money for the shoe just to get charged more as if the shoe wasn't already expensive...

author: Elisa
text: I ordered shoes from Stockx , got an update that my shoes arrived at stock x to be verified. Then showed shipped. I still have yet to receive my shoes and the tracking shows it came from Hong Kong, makes me think about is StockX really verifying these shoes.. smh
title: I ordered shoes from Stockx

author: TJ
text: i still have not recieved my money or my shoes ,  they told me i would have to get a hold of the people who shipped them to me like Fed Ex DHL, etc its such a huge loss if you dont get a hold of them 3 days after if you havent reciecved your package , well i didnt expect my package to get loss during transit , long story short this is crazy.

author: Chad Fuentes
text: Got my shoes earlier than expected but was missing a VERY important component of the retail pair. The exclusive sealed card that comes with the retail packaging. The spare laces were also removed from being attached to the shoes as well. If I agreed to pay the full asking price, I deserve to get everything I paid for AND in the retail state/condition. Will think twice about using StockX again. Very disappointed with my first time buying from this site…
title: Missing a VERY IMPORTANT part of the retail pair…

author: Scott Mcclellan
text: Ordering and receiving my merch was fine.  However, Beware that you CAN NOT RETURN YOUR ITEMS!!!.   The shoes I ordered ran smaller than other shoes of the same size.  Now, I'm stuck eating $152 until I can sell them.  I won't be using StockX again.
